EmailTemplate.name: Year 5A teacher - Alice Nixon
EmailTemplate.subject: Miss. Nixon's recovery
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group Dear Parents, As you may have heard, Miss Nixon has been in hospital over the course of the last week. I am delighted to say that Mrs Nixon is now out of hospital and is recuperating at her home in Moscow. Mrs Nixon will be back in school on Monday 14th October. In the meantime, Mrs Nixonâ€™s lessons to be covered by other members of the Upper Primary teaching team. Best Wishes, Paul Keach
Head of Secondary School and Upper Campus The International School of Moscow World Class Education __________________________________________________________ Member of The British School Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Affiliate Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Russian Ministry of Education
